articles.title: Asia stocks jump after steep losses; China shares gain on strong PMI - Investing.com
articles.description: Asia stocks jump after steep losses; China shares gain on strong PMI
articles.content:
Investing.com-- Asian stocks rebounded at the start of the month tracking last weeks strong finish on Wall Street, with Chinese shares rising on strong factory activity data.
